text:
01 of 13 SHAKIRA Shakira/Instagram; Inset: Getty The singer's longtime partner and father of the couple's two sons — 5-year-old Milan and 3-year-old Sasha — may play for Spain's national team, but the boys were all decked out in yellow gear to root for mom's native Colombia.

02 of 13 LIONEL MESSI Antonella Roccuzzo/Instagram The soccer player's longtime love, Antonella, went matchy-matchy with the couple's sons — 5-year-old Thiago and 2-year-old Mateo — when cheering for Team Argentina (and Messi, of course!).

03 of 13 ANNA KOURNIKOVA Anna Kournikova/Instagram The retired tennis star shared an adorable new photo of one of her babies, 5 months, in celebration of the World Cup in Russia as her home country defeated Saudi Arabia 5-0.

04 of 13 ENRIQUE IGLESIAS Enrique Iglesias/Instagram Cutest cheerleader ever! Iglesias shared a new photo of one of his twins, 5 months, adorably perched on his shoulders during the Spain vs. Portugal World Cup match.

05 of 13 CHEF MARCELA VALLADOLID Marcela Valladolid/Instagram It's a win! Chef Marcela and her son — dressed in Lucha Libre gear — celebrated Mexico's win over Germany with gusto.

06 of 13 CANDICE SWANEPOEL Candice Swanepoel/Instagram; Inset: Getty The Victoria's Secret Angel and new mom of two (she and fiancé Hermann Nicoli announced the arrival of their second son in June) shared a video to her Instagram Story of the couple's 20-month-old older child, Anacan, wearing the colors of his dad's native Brazil.

07 of 13 CHRISSY TEIGEN Chrissy Teigen/Instagram The model mama and her newborn son Miles also showed their support. In Friday's game, Brazil defeated Costa Rica 2-0.

08 of 13 EVA LONGORIA Eva Longoria/Instagram The star dresses up her little one, son Santiago, in Mexico gear as the new mom and her baby boy take cheer on Mexico from home.

09 of 13 GISELE BÜNDCHEN Gisele Bundchen/Instagram. Inset: Michael Loccisano/Getty The supermodel shared a photo of her 5½-year-old daughter Vivian Lake kicking around a soccer ball in a matching jersey in support of mom's native Brazil. "The 12th player is ready! Go Brazil!!!" Bündchen playfully captioned the shot in Portuguese.

10 of 13 ANNA KOURNIKOVA Anna Kournikova Instagram Enrique Iglesias and Kournikova's twins slipped into their pint-sized Spain jerseys for Sunday's game. The team would end up losing to Russia.

11 of 13 MATTHEW MCCONAUGHEY Camila Alves/Instagram The Oscar winner and wife Camila Alves' son Levi tapped into his inner sports fan as he joined his parents in rooting for mom's native Brazil.

12 of 13 GISELE BÜNDCHEN Gisele Bündchen/Instagram The supermodel's 8-year-old son Benjamin did a little jig following Brazil's 2-0 win over Mexico on Monday.
title: 2018 World Cup: Celeb Kids Watching the Game

meta_data.description: Because few things are cuter than pint-sized soccer fans wearing jerseys
meta_data.sailthru.author: Grace Gavilanes
